General.Name: ECARX Holdings Inc. Class A Ordinary shares
General.Description: ECARX Holdings Inc. develops a full-stack automotive computing platform to shape the interaction between people and cars by rapidly advancing the technology of smart mobility internationally. It offers system on a chip, central computing platforms, operating systems, and software. Its core products include infotainment head units, autonomous driving control units, digital cockpits, vehicle chip-set solutions, core operating system, and integrated software stack. The company has entered into a strategic partnership agreement with Black Sesame Technologies. ECARX Holdings Inc. was founded in 2017 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.
